definition: not occurring at expected times, merchandise that has imperfections
details:
adjective
- not occurring at expected times
= synonyms: unpredictable
- independent in behavior or thought
= example: independent in behavior or thought
= synonyms: maverick, unorthodox
- (of a surface or shape)
- lacking continuity or regularity
= example: lacking continuity or regularity
= synonyms: temporary
- deviating from normal expectations
= synonyms: atypical
- falling below the manufacturer's standard
= example: falling below the manufacturer's standard
- contrary to rule or accepted order or general practice
= example: contrary to rule or accepted order or general practice
- (of solids) not having clear dimensions that can be measured
- (used of the military) not belonging to or engaged in by regular army forces
= example: (used of the military) not belonging to or engaged in by regular army forces
noun
- merchandise that has imperfections
= synonyms: second
- a member of an irregular armed force that fights a stronger force by sabotage and harassment
= synonyms: guerrilla
